DOC.brief_title: Onabotulinumtoxin A Versus Kenalog Chronic Pelvic Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Chronic pelvic pain ( CPP ) common often debilitate problem among woman . The musculoskeletal system important factor chronic pelvic pain . Studies demonstrate woman CPP frequent musculoskeletal finding . On physical examination , myofascial trigger point find . Trigger point hyperirritable band muscle felt vaginal wall . They often knot-like taut painful pressure place . Intravaginal injection trigger point use steroid include Kenalog ( triamcinolone ) do produce decrease pelvic pain . Trigger point injection Onabotulinumtoxin A also show decrease pain subject CPP . This study compare two drug assess pain ( use subject questionnaire ) one , three six month post injection .
